readable.title: 2248487956_2603f55ab9
readable.content: An elderly woman in burgundy scratches her face as she observes a young man in a blue jacket and white baseball cap . An elderly woman is looking at a teenage boy A woman scratching her face . There are two people , a lady with a big ring on her finger , and a boy wearing a blue jacket . The woman in red clothing is wearing a ring and looking at a boy in blue clothing .
